entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Terrace Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 01:22 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -14.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Terrace Bay 04:00 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023
Temperature: -14.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -16.1°C
Wind: W 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 10:46 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Flurries at times heavy beginning in the morning. Amount 10 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 50 gusting to 70 late in the morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 10:46 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 late in the evening then becoming light after midnight. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 19 in the evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 10:46 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
